Text: Yes, I don't do dud torrents; this game runs as the devs have made it. It's no MW3 or Black Ops II, it seems to be a cheap attempt to rivel them though, the bobbing, & inaccurate fire seems to make you work harder to get from mission to mission, but it's a game you can play while you wait for something else to take your FPS fancy, I personally give it a 6/10.
this game does not work on windows 7 x64. I had tried different version of it but none work. don't waste your time.
